Symbol.Script_1D:
! kuten kirjasto 23:n DetlevelFunctionMacro
! -------------- kopioi nämä oman ohjelman esiohjelmaan
DETLEVEL_2D_MVO = 1 DETLEVEL_2D_SCSENS = 2 DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED = 3 DETLEVEL_2D_SIMPLE = 4 DETLEVEL_2D_DRAFT = 5 DETLEVEL_2D_SYMBOLIC = 6
dim stDetlevel2D[] stDetlevel2D[1] = `Esitystavan mukaan` stDetlevel2D[2] = `Mittakaavassa` stDetlevel2D[3] = `Täysi` stDetlevel2D[4] = `Keskitaso` stDetlevel2D[5] = `Matala` stDetlevel2D[6] = `Symboli`
! iDetlevel3D: DETLEVEL_3D_MVO = 1 ! DETLEVEL_3D_SCSENS = 2 ! Unused DETLEVEL_3D_DETAILED = 3 DETLEVEL_3D_SIMPLE = 4 DETLEVEL_3D_DRAFT = 5 DETLEVEL_3D_OFF = 6
dim stDetlevel3D[] stDetlevel3D[1] = `Esitystavan mukaan` ! stDetlevel3D[2] = `Mittakaavassa` stDetlevel3D[3] = `Täysi` stDetlevel3D[4] = `Yksinkertaistettu` stDetlevel3D[5] = `Kaaviomainen` stDetlevel3D[6] = `Pois`
! ============================================================================= ! 2D Detail Level ! =============================================================================
! iDetlevel2D:
_iDetlevel2D = iDetlevel2D
if (iDetlevel2D = DETLEVEL_2D_MVO) then ! by MVO _reqDetlevel2D = 0 _success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Esitystapa", "iDetlevel2D", _reqDetlevel2D) if (_success > 0) then _iDetlevel2D = _reqDetlevel2D else _iDetlevel2D = DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED endif else if (iDetlevel2D = DETLEVEL_2D_SCSENS) then ! Scale Sensitive _iDetlevel2D = DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED if (GLOB_SCALE > 150) then _iDetlevel2D = DETLEVEL_2D_DRAFT if (GLOB_SCALE > 75) & (GLOB_SCALE <= 150) then _iDetlevel2D = DETLEVEL_2D_SIMPLE if (GLOB_SCALE <= 75) then _iDetlevel2D = DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! 3D Detail Level ! =============================================================================
_iDetlevel3D = iDetlevel3D
if (iDetlevel3D = DETLEVEL_3D_MVO) then ! by MVO _reqDetlevel3D = 0 _bSuccess = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Esitystapa", "iDetlevel3D", _reqDetlevel3D)
_iDetlevel3D = DETLEVEL_3D_DETAILED if _bSuccess then _iDetlevel3D = _reqDetlevel3D endif
! ============================================================================= ! Viivat ! =============================================================================
if esitystavan_mukainen then _=LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Esitystapa", "gs_cont_pen", gs_cont_pen) _=LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Esitystapa", "gs_line_type", gs_line_type) _=LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Esitystapa", "gs_fill", gs_fill) _=LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Esitystapa", "gs_fill_type", gs_fill_type) _=LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Esitystapa", "gs_fill_pen", gs_fill_pen) _=LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Esitystapa", "gs_back_pen", gs_back_pen) _=LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Esitystapa", "gs_view_pen", gs_view_pen) _=LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Esitystapa", "res", res) _=LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Esitystapa", "rautalanka", rautalanka) _=LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Esitystapa", "varjot", varjot) endif
end _iDetlevel2D, _iDetlevel3D, gs_cont_pen, gs_line_type, gs_fill, gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, gs_view_pen, res, rautalanka,varjot
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_PAGE sivu, -1, "Esitystavat", "" ! ----------------------------- Esitystavat
x = 10 y = ensimmainen_rivi
UI_OUTFIELD "Käytä esitystavan mukaisia piirtoasetuksia", x, y UI_INFIELD "esitystavan_mukainen", x+230,y-3, inlev,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD "2D-esitys" ,x, y UI_STYLE 0,0 y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD `Detaljitaso` ,x ,y UI_INFIELD "iDetlevel2D" ,x+tab ,y,inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Ääriviivan kynä" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*esitystavan_mukainen UI_INFIELD "gs_cont_pen" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Ääriviivan tyyppi" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*esitystavan_mukainen UI_INFIELD "gs_line_type" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Symbolin täyte" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*esitystavan_mukainen UI_INFIELD "gs_fill" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
!IF gs_fill THEN
UI_OUTFIELD "Täytteen tyyppi" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*(not(gs_fill) or esitystavan_mukainen) UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_type" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Täytteen kynä" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*(not(gs_fill) or esitystavan_mukainen) UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_pen" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Täytteen taustakynä",x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*(not(gs_fill) or esitystavan_mukainen) UI_INFIELD "gs_back_pen" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
!ENDIF
x = 444/2 y = ensimmainen_rivi + rivivali
ui_style 0,1 ui_outfield "3D-esitys" ,x, y ui_style 0,0 y=y+rivivali
ui_outfield `Detaljitaso ` ,x ,y,outlev ,outkor ui_infield "iDetlevel3D" ,x+tab ,y,inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Ääriviivan kynä" ,x ,y, outlev ,outkor, 4*esitystavan_mukainen UI_INFIELD "gs_view_pen" ,x+tab ,y, inlev ,inkor y=y+rivivali
Symbol.Script_VL:
! -------------- kopioi nämä oman ohjelman arvonlistaohjelmaan
values{2} "iDetlevel2D" \ DETLEVEL_2D_MVO, stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_2D_MVO], ! DETLEVEL_2D_SCSENS, stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_SCSENS], DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED, stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_DETAILED], DETLEVEL_2D_SIMPLE, stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_SIMPLE], DETLEVEL_2D_DRAFT, stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_DRAFT], DETLEVEL_2D_SYMBOLIC, stDetlevel2D[DETLEVEL_2D_SYMBOLIC]
values{2} "iDetlevel3D" \ DETLEVEL_3D_OFF, stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_OFF], DETLEVEL_3D_MVO, stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_MVO], DETLEVEL_3D_DETAILED, stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_DETAILED], DETLEVEL_3D_SIMPLE, stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_SIMPLE], DETLEVEL_3D_DRAFT, stDetlevel3D[DETLEVEL_3D_DRAFT]
if esitystavan_mukainen then LOCK "gs_back_pen" LOCK "gs_cont_pen" LOCK "gs_fill" LOCK "gs_fill_pen" LOCK "gs_fill_type" LOCK "gs_line_type" LOCK "gs_view_pen" endif
